bug.author: omertalmi5
bug.summary: URL link for documentation for torch_core library from the doc() method gives incorrect url
bug.description:
Describe the bug When execute the doc() method on term under the torch_core library in the is incorrect. The url gives back 404 error code. To Reproduce
Execute doc() on any term under torch core in the documentation Enter to the "Show in docs" link
The URL link presents for the docs is for : <denchmark-link:https://docs.fast.ai/torch.core#tensor>https://docs.fast.ai/torch.core#tensor</denchmark-link>
instead of the correct URL link <denchmark-link:https://docs.fast.ai/torch_core#tensor>https://docs.fast.ai/torch_core#tensor</denchmark-link>
There should be a '_' instead of "." in the name in the URL link. Error with full stack trace <denchmark-code>Not Found The requested URL was not found on this server.
If you found this broken link on a fast.ai site or search engine, please tell us about it by filing a bug report here.
</denchmark-code>
